SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.virtualmodel

Class VirtualGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.common.util.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.virtualmodel.VirtualGame
public class VirtualGame extends Observable
Represents a virtual game environment that mirrors the state of an actual game. It manages game state, player information, and game updates.
